channel.title: Help me please [pi]
channel.description: well ive added a npc for my new minigame and i wanted to open a shop through dialogue ( by clickingbuttons ) but when i click on the button the shop open for like 1 second and closes, should i make like a cycle event ( and how ) or something else? thank you very much ( sorry for bad grammer if you dont understand me add me on skype : jelle-xxscape )

item.title: Help me please [pi]
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Check the case its in for exits etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please [pi]
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

ive added this in clickingbuttons :
in case 9158:

if (c.dialogueAction == 187) { c.sendMessage("You currently have <col=255>" + c.zombPoints + "</col> Zombie points."); c.getShops().openShop(88); }
dialogue handler :

case 177: sendOption2("Yes bring it on!", "no thanks, i would like to visit the store"); c.dialogueAction = 187; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Make sure the Case you’re using for the Dialogue doesn’t call something which closes Interfaces, etc.

Example of what I mean:

     case #### // Dialogue Action
          actionshere
               exitInterfacing();
     break;

Read full topic
